document_data.mainbody:
The Adventurers Guild was an organized play program run by the Role-Playing Group Association (RPGA) for the 2 edition of Dungeons & Dragons between 1997 and 2000. Each module was intended to tie in with a larger adventure or sourcebook.
Only modules related to the Forgotten Realms are listed here.
*
CategoryRPGA campaigns
CategoryOrganized play programs
